original_title: Gibbons: The Forgotten Apes In Peril
overview: Gibbons are highly intelligent, agile and acrobatic tree-dwelling apes, found in the tropical forests of Asia. Most of the gibbon species are highly endangered and are on the verge of extinction as a result of the destruction of their tropical rain forest habitat as well as being hunted for food.
title: Gibbons: The Forgotten Apes In Peril
